title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: The HiFi Lounge
directions: between Fillmore St and Steiner St
content: The HiFi Lounge is where people come to dance the night away. It also features live DJs, games, and big screen TVs. Happy hour begins at 5PM and they offer $2 Budweisers and $3 well Drinks. Their "Girls of Taste" (wine tasting for women) is not to be missed and is held once a month.
